RequirementsÂ¶

MINICHEM is compatible for Python >=3.7.1. The following packages are required to run MINICHEM:

  • re

  • numpy

  • bokeh

  • scipy

  • sympy

  • pandas

  • warning

  • networkx

  • selenium

  • phantomjs

  • holoviews

  • itertools

  • matplotlib
